entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023
